channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Behind the Universe demo: From prompt to production with VS Code, GitHub Copilot and the Microsoft Agent Framework】Universe 演示背后：使用 VS Code、GitHub Copilot 和 Microsoft Agent Framework 从提示到生产
item.description: 【At this year’s GitHub Universe, we set out to answer a simple question: What would it take to go from an idea to production in under 30 minutes – using only natural language, your editor, and AI? On stage, we built a cloud-native, intelligent app from scratch using】在今年的 GitHub Universe 上，我们着手回答一个简单的问题：仅使用自然语言、编辑器和人工智能，在 30 分钟内从一个想法转变为生产需要什么？在舞台上，我们使用以下方法从头开始构建了一个云原生智能应用程序

item.title: 【💫 Welcome to Aspire: Your stack, streamlined】💫 欢迎来到 Aspire：您的堆栈，精简的
item.description: 【We’re excited to announce a new chapter for Aspire and a new home at aspire.dev. What started two years ago as an experiment to simplify distributed app development has become a thriving, community-driven, extensible, code-first pl】我们很高兴地宣布 Aspire 翻开了新篇章，并在 aspire.dev 上建立了新家。两年前开始的一个简化分布式应用程序开发的实验已经成为一个蓬勃发展的、社区驱动的、可扩展的、代码优先的平台。

item.title: 【Multi-region Expansion for Azure Deployments】Azure 部署的多区域扩展
item.description: 【Why Financial Services Organizations Should Consider Expanding to Other Azure Regions for New Workloads As a Cloud Architect, I work closely with financial services organizations to help them unlock the full potential of Azure innovations. One of the most impactful strategies I r】为什么金融服务组织应考虑将新工作负载扩展到其他 Azure 区域 作为云架构师，我与金融服务组织密切合作，帮助他们释放 Azure 创新的全部潜力。我最有影响力的策略之一

item.title: 【Microsoft C++ Team at CppCon 2025: Trip Report】Microsoft C++ 团队参加 CppCon 2025：行程报告
item.description: 【Another year and another CppCon is all wrapped up! Microsoft was pleased to once again be an exhibitor and to have several of our employees present sessions at the conference. Here are my major takeaways from the keynotes, sessions, conversations, and the general vibe. AI tooling is finding a footing with the C++ community. The ne】又一年又一届 CppCon 圆满落幕！ Microsoft 很高兴再次成为参展商，并邀请我们的几位员工出席会议。以下是我从主题演讲、会议、对话和总体氛围中得到的主要收获。 AI 工具正在 C++ 社区中站稳脚跟。内

item.title: 【Join us at .NET Conf: Dive into the future of development with Visual Studio 2026】加入我们的 .NET Conf：使用 Visual Studio 2026 深入探讨开发的未来
item.description: 【We're thrilled to invite you to one of the most exciting events in the .NET ecosystem: .NET Conf. It runs from November 11th through the 13th and you’re invited! This annual virtual conference is a must-attend for developers, architects, and enthusiasts looking t】我们很高兴邀请您参加 .NET 生态系统中最激动人心的活动之一：.NET Conf。活动时间为 11 月 11 日至 13 日，诚邀您！对于寻求技术的开发人员、架构师和爱好者来说，这个年度虚拟会议是必须参加的。

item.title: 【Microspeak: turn into a pumpkin】Microspeak：变成南瓜
item.description: 【The English idiom turn into a pumpkin comes from the fairy tale story of Cinderella, in which the protagonist's ragged clothes are magically transformed into an elegant gown and a pumpkin is transformed into a carriage, allowing her to attend a royal ball. She is warned that the magic wears off at midnight, upon which her clot】英语成语“turn into a Pump”源自童话故事《灰姑娘》，主角破烂的衣服神奇地变成了一件优雅的礼服，而南瓜则变成了一辆马车，让她能够参加皇家舞会。她被警告说魔法会在午夜消失，她的凝块就会消失。

item.title: 【Tuning and Optimization of Speech-to-Text (STT), Text-to-Speech (TTS), and Custom Keyword Recognition in Azure Speech Services】Azure 语音服务中的语音转文本 (STT)、文本转语音 (TTS) 和自定义关键字识别的调整和优化
item.description: 【Introduction Optimizing Speech-to-Text (STT) and Text-to-Speech (TTS) is essential for developers building voice-enabled applications, as it enhances recognition accuracy and overall user experience. Additionally, custom keyword recognition enables hands-free activation for voice assistants. This blog outlines: Method】简介 优化语音转文本 (STT) 和文本转语音 (TTS) 对于开发人员构建支持语音的应用程序至关重要，因为它可以提高识别准确性和整体用户体验。此外，自定义关键字识别可以实现语音助手的免提激活。该博客概述了：方法

item.title: 【Failures Happen in Cloud, but how Azure Cosmos DB keeps your Applications Online】云中经常发生故障，但 Azure Cosmos DB 如何使应用程序保持在线
item.description: 【The only thing that’s constant in distributed systems is failures. No cloud platform is immune to failures — from regional outages and transient network blips to human errors or hardware faults. What defines resiliency & reliability isn’t the absence of failure, but how systems anticipate, isolate, and recover from them. Here is a】分布式系统中唯一不变的就是失败。没有一个云平台能够免受故障的影响——从区域性中断和短暂的网络故障到人为错误或硬件故障。弹性和可靠性的定义不是没有故障，而是系统如何预测、隔离故障并从中恢复。这是一个

item.title: 【Introducing the azd extension to configure GitHub Copilot coding agent integration with Azure】引入 azd 扩展来配置 GitHub Copilot 编码代理与 Azure 的集成
item.description: 【This new azd extension makes it easy to use the GitHub Copilot coding agent with Azure Want Copilot to help you build apps in the cloud? This tool does all the boring setup work for you. Instead of spending hours figuring out permissions and security, you can get Copilot coding agent connected to your cloud resources i】这个新的 azd 扩展使您可以轻松地将 GitHub Copilot 编码代理与 Azure 结合使用 想要 Copilot 来帮助您在云中构建应用程序吗？该工具可以为您完成所有无聊的设置工作。您可以让 Copilot 编码代理连接到您的云资源，而无需花费数小时来确定权限和安全性。

item.title: 【Upgrading C++ Projects to Visual Studio 2026】将 C++ 项目升级到 Visual Studio 2026
item.description: 【With Visual Studio 2026 version 18.0 getting closer to General Availability (GA), we want to share with you how you can upgrade your projects from your current versions of Visual Studio and the Microsoft C++ (MSVC) Build Tools to the latest versions.】随着 Visual Studio 2026 版本 18.0 距离正式发布 (GA) 越来越近，我们希望与您分享如何将项目从当前版本的 Visual Studio 和 Microsoft C++ (MSVC) 生成工具升级到最新版本。
